short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to calculate running pace and calories burned on an activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of searching for a calculator to calculate your pace in an activity, and your calories burned?
Then you found the right extension for that: runner-tool does that for you in a few clicks.

Still has a history where you saved your last calculation made in the extension.

Contact us for new features.

What you waiting for to use now?
